mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER_GROUP" WHERE GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} AND MEMBER_GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_DEL_FL, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') "ENROLL_DATE", AUTHORITY, MEMBER_IMG, TO_CHAR(MEMBER_GROUP_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') "MEMBER_GROUP_ENROLL_DATE", MEMBER_GROUP_BAN, MEMBER_GROUP_DEL_FL FROM MEMBER_GROUP MG JOIN "MEMBER" M ON (MG.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MG.GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} AND MG.MEMBER_GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N'
ORDER BY MEMBER_ID ASC
ORDER BY MEMBER_ID DESC
ORDER BY MEMBER_NICKNAME ASC
ORDER BY MEMBER_NICKNAME DESC
ORDER BY MEMBER_GROUP_ENROLL_DATE ASC
ORDER BY MEMBER_GROUP_ENROLL_DATE DESC
ORDER BY MEMBER_DEL_FL ASC
ORDER BY MEMBER_DEL_FL DESC
ORDER BY MEMBER_GROUP_BAN ASC
ORDER BY MEMBER_GROUP_BAN DESC
ORDER BY AUTHORITY DESC, MEMBER_GROUP_ENROLL_DATE ASC
